title: Day 1207
content:
# Day 1207

![[https://x.com/RussellOkung/status/1943858628865269789](https://x.com/RussellOkung/status/1943858628865269789)](https://miro.medium.com/1*sPGwqV23K3LXIdTfWjpRjw.jpeg)

![[https://x.com/selkis_2028/status/1943865443690909950](https://x.com/selkis_2028/status/1943865443690909950)](https://miro.medium.com/1*7mrkMcddqVikfEoVvTNhnA.jpeg)

Sometimes the most loving thing we can do is model the change we want to see and leave space for others to make their own choices. I feel like this was the main idea in most of Ayn Rand's books.

![[https://x.com/ChrisJBakke/status/1943867832816873811](https://x.com/ChrisJBakke/status/1943867832816873811)](https://miro.medium.com/1*e51mwdpCmQc3_TentqcjFQ.png)

![[https://x.com/ConorChepenik/status/1943874072820974047](https://x.com/ConorChepenik/status/1943874072820974047)](https://miro.medium.com/1*OWPoPteQwAogti5xKBTHIw.png)

From personal experience 3 things that have improved my life tremendously are praying to God, hanging with my family more, and saving any excess money I have in Bitcoin.

Those 3 changes have had such a positive impact on my life.

7/11/25

Conor Jay Chepenik
